text: Jerry Carl (born June 17, 1958) is a Republican politician who represents Alabama's 1st congressional district in the United States House of Representatives. He defeated Democrat James Averhart in the November general election and was sworn in on January 3, 2021. ==Election history== ==References== Category:1958 births Category:United States representatives from Alabama Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Mobile, Alabama Category:Politicians from Mobile, Alabama Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Living people
title: Jerry Carl
